docs.abstract: Facebook’s “post tabs” try to keep you in the conversation your friends are having about your posts, but you can turn off the tabs.
docs.snippet: Facebook’s “post tabs” try to keep you in the conversation your friends are having about your posts, but you can turn off the tabs.
docs.lead_paragraph: Q. I often get interrupted by little pop-up windows showing comments from friends when I’m using Facebook on my computer. I looked in the notification settings for a place to turn off the pop-ups, but didn’t see anything. Am I stuck with these annoyances?

docs.abstract: We got through another week of wall-to-wall news about Facebook. Here are a few other stories that might have escaped your attention.
docs.snippet: We got through another week of wall-to-wall news about Facebook. Here are a few other stories that might have escaped your attention.
docs.lead_paragraph: Each week, Kevin Roose, technology columnist at The New York Times, discusses developments in the tech industry, offering analysis and maybe a joke or two. Want this newsletter in your inbox? Sign up here.

headline.main: Kevin’s Week in Tech: Another Facebook-Free Edition
headline.print_headline: Another Facebook-Free Edition, to Prove There Is Other Tech News

docs.abstract: If you find yourself repeatedly correcting Apple’s auto-correction software while you’re typing, you can reset its dictionary or turn it off.
docs.snippet: If you find yourself repeatedly correcting Apple’s auto-correction software while you’re typing, you can reset its dictionary or turn it off.
docs.lead_paragraph: Q. Do I have control over my iPhone’s autocorrect function beyond repeatedly correcting words it mistakenly tries to use?

headline.print_headline: Taking Full Control Of Auto Correct

docs.abstract: If a scammer has swiped your password and is using your account to spew spam, take action and add measures to help stop it from happening again.
docs.snippet: If a scammer has swiped your password and is using your account to spew spam, take action and add measures to help stop it from happening again.
docs.lead_paragraph: Q. Could you please review best practices if one’s email is hacked? Is changing the password for that email sufficient? Is it necessary to change the email address (use a whole new email) for each site, like Amazon, that uses the hacked email as the user login?

headline.main: What to Do if Your Email Is Hacked
headline.print_headline: How to Bolster Your Email Defenses

docs.abstract: The authorities in a number of countries say the company is unfairly using its leverage over consumers to extract personal information from them.
docs.snippet: The authorities in a number of countries say the company is unfairly using its leverage over consumers to extract personal information from them.
docs.lead_paragraph: Data. It is the gasoline that fuels advertiser-supported internet giants like Facebook and the gold that companies mine for their algorithms.

headline.main: European Regulators Ask if Facebook Is Taking Too Much Data
headline.print_headline: Europe Asks: Is Facebook Vacuuming Up Too Much Data From Users?

byline.original: By Natasha Singer and Sapna Maheshwari

docs.abstract: The technology giant reported strong quarterly results thanks to an aggressive transition to delivering software as an internet service.
docs.snippet: The technology giant reported strong quarterly results thanks to an aggressive transition to delivering software as an internet service.
docs.lead_paragraph: Microsoft, more than any other traditional software company, has swiftly and profitably made the shift to delivering software as an internet service.

headline.main: Microsoft’s Cloud Has Business Booming Again
headline.print_headline: Rapid Growth Of Cloud Unit Is Paying Off For Microsoft

docs.abstract: Recent commercial real estate transactions in New York.
docs.snippet: Recent commercial real estate transactions in New York.

docs.abstract: Several streaming services offer multiple channels for athletic events, games and matches — which can make ditching the monthly cable bill even easier for some fans.
docs.snippet: Several streaming services offer multiple channels for athletic events, games and matches — which can make ditching the monthly cable bill even easier for some fans.
docs.lead_paragraph: Q. If I wanted to cut the cord and switch to a streaming service, would I be able to watch live sports? What’s the cheapest option?

headline.main: How to Watch Live Sports Online

docs.abstract: Apple’s tablet has a headphone jack and a Lightning port to plug in external devices, but you can also pair gadgets and sling files wirelessly.
docs.snippet: Apple’s tablet has a headphone jack and a Lightning port to plug in external devices, but you can also pair gadgets and sling files wirelessly.
docs.lead_paragraph: Q. Is it possible to use external devices with an iPad Pro, particularly for file storage?

docs.abstract: The photo-sharing social network includes a feature for posting and annotating multiple photos and videos in one daily collection.
docs.snippet: The photo-sharing social network includes a feature for posting and annotating multiple photos and videos in one daily collection.
docs.lead_paragraph: Q. I keep getting Instagram alerts on my phone that say someone has updated a “story.” What exactly is an Instagram story?
